00064 const bool CReadDisplay::hasActiveAnchor(){
00065   return !activeAnchor().isEmpty();
00066 }

00069 QPopupMenu* const CReadDisplay::installedPopup(){
00070   qWarning("CReadDisplay::installedPopup()");
00071   Q_ASSERT(m_popup);
00072     return m_popup;

00074 
00075 void CReadDisplay::print(const CDisplay::TextPart type){
00076   CDisplayWindow* window = parentWindow();
00077   CSwordKey* const key = window->key();
00078   CSwordModuleInfo* module = key->module();
00079 
00080   switch (type) {
00081         case Document: {
00082             if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible) {
00083             CSwordVerseKey* vk = dynamic_cast<CSwordVerseKey*>(key);
00084 
00085         CSwordVerseKey startKey(*vk);
00086                 startKey.Verse(1);  
00087                 
00088             CSwordVerseKey stopKey(*vk);
00089                 if (CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module))
00090                     stopKey.Verse( bible->verseCount( bible->bookNumber(startKey.book()), startKey.Chapter() ) );
00091                 CExportManager::printKey(module, startKey.key(), stopKey.key());
00092         }
00093         else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon || module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary ) {
00094             CExportManager::printKey(module, key->key(), key->key());
00095       }
00096     };
00097 
00098     case AnchorWithText: {
00099       if (hasActiveAnchor())
00100                 CExportManager::printKey( activeAnchor() );
00101     };
00102 
00103     default:
00104         break;
00105     }
00106 }
